Name: Arbor MH1 Mining Laser
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 1

Optimal Range: 30m
Maximum Range: 150m

Power Transfer: 1850
Extraction Throughput: 0.35 SCU/s
Module Slots: 1

The Arbor MH1 became the universe's most heralded mining laser thanks to Greycat Industrial's exacting standards and business prowess. The laser's solid, reliable design found favor among industrial and solo operations for effectively balancing speed and safety. Greycat capitalized on this reputation by securing exclusive contracts that made the Arbor MH1 the standard laser head on most mining ships.
